title: Vibrant Seniors Events Black Los Angeles Tour #3
desc: Vibrant Seniors Events proudly presents the third of three Black Los Angeles Tours! We will visit the  Museum of African American Art , where international award-winning artist  Synthia Saint James  will give a private talk, sharing with us her art and her stories. Afterwards, we'll enjoy lunch at the legendary  Dulan's on Crenshaw . Roundtrip transportation and a donation to the museum is included. Rite Aide Altadena  ( map ) ? 735 E. Altadena Dr., Altadena 8:00 a.m. departure & 2:00 p.m. return Please note:  Lunch is not included in the price of the tour.? Refund policy : No refunds will be issued after March 10, 2016. Additional questions?  Email us at? info@vibrantseniorsevents.com ?or call us at (626) 485-2342.
